definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Its appeal depends as much on the mystique of its origins as its nutritional qualities.
sentences.chinese: 牦牛具有神秘性的产地和营养价值使它充满魅力。

sentences.english: The author posts using the " yak " username.
sentences.chinese: 作者员额用“牦牛”的用户名。

sentences.english: Sunan yak are used mainly for transport and meat production, with milk and wool production taking the second place.
sentences.chinese: 肃南牦牛以驮运和产肉为主，产奶和产毛次之。

sentences.english: With its strong arms, it quickly killed three of the yaks.
sentences.chinese: 它很快就用强壮的手臂杀死了三头牦牛。

sentences.english: Yy:Ya-ya the yak plays yo-yo in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 牦牛丫丫在院子里玩溜溜球。

sentences.english: Yaks provide Droma and her family with everything they need.
sentences.chinese: 牦牛为Droma家提供了所需的一切。

sentences.english: That sorry looking Frozen Yak wasn't completely lost.
sentences.chinese: 那头看上去可怜巴巴的牦牛并没有完全输。

sentences.english: The study aimed to analyze the nutrient composition of Northern Tibet yak meat and evaluate the quality characteristics of yak meat.
sentences.chinese: 分析藏北牦牛肉营养成分，评价牦牛肉品质特点。

sentences.english: The study aimed to analyze the nutrient composition of Northern Tibet yak meat and evaluate the quality characteristics of yak meat.
sentences.chinese: 分析藏北牦牛肉营养成分，评价牦牛肉品质特点。

sentences.english: The pass itself is dotted with prayer flags and there are several herds of yak around.
sentences.chinese: 这个关口到处都经幡，附近还有几个牦牛群。

sentences.english: Tibetan people are most like eating yak butter production.
sentences.chinese: 藏区人民最喜食牦牛产的酥油。

sentences.english: And have special Halloween and dance yak .
sentences.chinese: 并有特殊的鬼节和舞牦牛。

sentences.english: Everything from sides of yak meat to items of laundry was thrown onto the pyres .
sentences.chinese: 不论什么，从牦牛肉到洗衣用品，都被扔到火堆之中。

sentences.english: I have never eaten yak meat before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未吃过牦牛肉。

sentences.english: One day in 1974, Lhakpa took her yaks up the mountain as usual.
sentences.chinese: 年的一天，拉卡帕和往常一样赶着牦牛到山上放牧。

sentences.english: Ambassador and Mrs. Huntsman pause to view a yak butter candle at Ganden Monastery.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培大使及夫人在甘丹寺内驻足观看牦牛酥油蜡烛。

definition: offspring of a bull and a female yak
highland barley (grown in Tibet and Qinghai)/qingke barley
